author: A Google User
comment: One of the best out there, however since changing my phone to a Moto G5S it no longer works, it keeps crashing...any suggestions to get it working again !!!!

author: A Google User
comment: Used this app for a while, and I can understand why it's now been monetised but at £5.95 it has made me look around at other alternatives as it seems a bit steep.  The free one is a good taster but the pro version might make you look elsewhere by
title: Just got pricey

author: A Google User
comment: Like it, I had some problems finding the way to the map of the course. This is a great app, and showing it to my friends they completely agree. A couple of additional users is on it's way.
title: Great app

author: A Google User
comment: Like indeed the update! Very interesting to see your progress in the handicap stats through various seasons. Unfortunately it only calculate your handicap for rounds of 18 holes - 9 hole rounds are not included. I hope you will include this in the next update! :-)  Once again: Thank you for a wonderful and very, very useful app!!!!!!! I don't see the opportunity to rate it more than 5 *....
title: Stats update

author: A Google User
comment: app does everything any golfer needs.  Developer is also very responsive and open to suggestions.
title: Great App

author: A Google User
comment: With the more recent updates, it's becoming a pretty good app with some really nice features. It's not too intuitive, but pretty robust.
title: Getting pretty good.

author: A Google User
comment: Does everything I want. Score, range, shot tracking and stats. Easy to create new course maps online.

author: A Google User
comment: Outstanding app. Does everything you need. Scorecard and stat tracking for multiple players. Gps in simple and map modes. Add and edit your own course

author: A Google User
comment: Great app. Great for playing Stableford.

author: A Google User
comment: Great app. Does almost everything you need. Developer is very quick to respond to any query.

author: A Google User
comment: Great app. Shame l can't add more than 5 of my own courses?

author: A Google User
comment: Great program, works like a charm.... Super job.

author: A Google User
comment: Shannon

author: A Google User
comment: Fantastic app. 5 stars.

author: A Google User
comment: Very good app in and of itself, but severely lacking in courses! The website is unusable on Hero - map does not work. Site needs search function.

author: A Google User
comment: Excellent software. Very stable. Support for slope and stableford which is excellent. Integration with google maps!

author: A Google User
comment: I have never put a comment for an app but this one is good that I had to put one great does almost everything you want

author: A Google User
comment: Can i ask why this app needs access to my phone calls?

author: A Google User
comment: Good scorecard overall. Graphics could be more clear. Also would be nice to add more than 9 strokes per hole, for my friends of course :)

author: A Google User
comment: Enkelt och bra. Lätt att lägga till egna banor både via app och hemsida.

author: A Google User
comment: Great software, even I had to add finnish golf courses by myself

author: A Google User
comment: Should have a zoom in and out feature

author: A Google User
comment: Great app, love the statistic functionality. Combine it with a website for backup of ones scores and improved statistical calculations and it'll rule

author: A Google User
comment: Christ almighty. Why so many updates? Updates almost every day. Has updated twice today!

author: A Google User
comment: Last update removed all my buddies, courses and rounds again. Un-installing. Dev should mention what's new on each update.

author: A Google User
comment: So far so good. Does what it says on the tin...
